features: +10°/-15° Tilt, +/-90°Swivel (Maximum swivel angle depends on TV size)and +/-3° rotate for maximum viewing flexibility, Post-installation level adjustment allows the TV to perfectly level
Articulating arm retracts 2.3-Inch (to wall) to save space, and extends up to 16.5-Inch from the wall

Strong Material: 1.8/2.0 mm cold-rolled steel, Max Safe Load is 77 lbs. Automatic robot welding technology makes whole unit sturdy thus ensures mounted TV stable and secure. Please Install your precious TV with confidence. Quick and easy to install.

Fits most LED LCD TV's of 37-70 Inch TVs.It fits VESA 200X200mm, 300X300mm, 400X200mm, 400X400mm, 600x300mm 600x200mm,600X400mm.Please check VESA (mounting hole pattern behind TV), stud spacing, possible blocked cable/input and TV weight prior to making purchase decision to determine whether this TV wall mount fits your TV and the installation application.
body.description: This premium articulating mount is designed to universally fit most LED, LCD, Plasma TVs and other flat panel displays from 37" to 70", is compatible with Samsung, Sony, LG, Sharp, Insignia, Vizio, Haier, Toshiba, Sharp, Element, TCL, Westinghouse 37,40, 42, 47, 48, 49, 50, 52, 55, 60, 65, 70 inch TVs. This unit is designed to use the standard VESA patterns installed in almost all flat screen TVs up to 600mm x 400mm.It Fits VESA 200X200mm, 300X300mm, 400X200mm, 400X400mm, 600x300mm 600x200mm,600X400mm.Please check VESA (mounting hole pattern behind TV), stud spacing, possible blocked cable/input and TV weight prior to making purchase decision to determine whether this TV wall mount fits your TV and the installation application. Constructed from commercial-grade, heavy-duty steel, and high-quality barrel hinges, this sturdy unit is rated with a capacity up to 77 pounds. Automatic robot welding technology makes whole unit sturdy thus ensures mounted TV stable and secure. Please Install your precious TV with confidence. Quick and easy to install. The smooth-motion, articulating design allows for tilting, panning, and extension to find the perfect viewing angle. The arms of the television mount can be extended up to 16.5 inches from the wall or retracted back to within about 2.3 inches. In addition, the TV can swivel from +90 to -90 degrees (left or right) and the tilt can be set from +10 to -15 degrees to find your ideal settings. Convenient openings in the arms and back plate provide space to pass cables and wires through for a clean and uncluttered look. For your convenience, the articulating arms and back plate are pre-assembled right out of the box and the step by step instructions will guide you through the simple assembly and installation process.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: • Universal Design-Our sturdy TV wall mount is compatible with most 37”-70” TVs you can find on the market including Samsung, Vizio, Sony, Panasonic, LG, Sharp, Toshiba, etc. The strong construction is able to carry a TV flat panel/LED/LCD/OLED Monitor/Curved TV weighing up to 77lbs. From min 200x200 to max 600x400 VESA patterns, the TV mount can support them all. • Full Motion Adjustability-The strong full motion articulating arm enables large extension distance from 2.5” to 16.8” which is perfect for customized viewing distance for comfortable TV viewing experience. The ±90° ample swivel range allows you to watch TV from different locations, unlocking more possibilities for TV viewing. • Corner TV Wall Mount-The space-saving one stud design is perfect for corner installation, freeing up more space for bookshelves, wardrobes, cabinets and more. • Anti-Glare Tilting Mechanism-Coming with -20°~+ 20° tilting design, the TV bracket not only allows you to have optimized TV viewing experience by reducing the glare on your screenafor but also provides comfortable viewing angles. • Quality Hinge Pin & Gasket-The high strength hinge pin is able to hold up to 66lbs with stability. As the hinge pin and gasket smoothly work together, the TV wall mount allows for precise positioning and effortless swinging from side to side. • Easy Installation-The TV mount is compatible with wood studs/concrete wall/brick wall installation. With all required mounting hardware prepared, only 3 steps are needed to mount your TV on wall. The intuitive installation manual and video enable easy TV mounting without hassle. • Convenient & Safe- The open plate design allows you to directly mount the bracket over electrical outlets, solving any problems of wire organization. The extra security screws are added to prevent the TV mount from accidental removal and sliding off.a

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. I’m not confident I can install it myself when I get it again for bedroom.
reviews.reviewText: I got a 55 inch tv. I wanted to mount it in my living room, my dad did the installation but also taught me and allowed me to help and I’m confident lll be able to do it myself when I buy another one of these for my 50 inch in my bedroom. I love this thing, I was concerned it wasn’t going to be practical for such a big tv but it truly works and has held up wonderfully. I am so psyched to buy another one and get the same viewing experience in my bedroom that I get in my living room with this one, it’s made watching tv more “fancy”, like I’m at the theatre, I can move my tv so I can watch tv while cooking )esp cooking channels where I’m following their recipe), I am so happy I got this. One of my favorite purchases on Amazon ever honestly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very satisfied with price and the value received.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works but cannot support some sizes it states it can.
reviews.reviewText: It states it can support TVs that weigh 70 lbs max. My TV was 65lbs and caused the articulated portion to bend slightly. I recommend go to a more heavier articulated tv support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and should work well .I built my own furniture and it worked well for my needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for bigger TVs
reviews.reviewText: It may say it can handle somewhat larger TVs, but our newer (38 lb) 65" is causing some sag in the hinge. It anchors securely into the stud in the wall. I only bought this because I couldn't find a mount that would span 24" for a decent price. My usual practice when the studs are 24" is to mount a board spanning 2, then attach a 16" mount to the board. It is a bit obtrusive, but is sturdier than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the compactness and it is very sturdy so love the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love my tv mount. Easy to put up and hang my tv. Best decision I made.
